messages.description: Usage message for the program. {0} is the program name.
messages.C:
Usage: {0} -d [-v] archive file...
       {0} -m [-a|-b|-i] [-v] archive file...
       {0} -p [-sv] archive file...
       {0} -q [-cv] archive file...
       {0} -r [-a|-b|-i] [-cuv] archive file...
       {0} -t [-sv] archive file...
       {0} -x [svCT] archive file...
